column4: Hello, everyone. I've just received the security updates for "login" and "passwd" packages.
Where can I read about what was the problem?
launchpad has changelogs, although I always find it easier to get them through packages.ubuntu.com: http://changelogs.ubuntu.com/changelogs/pool/main/s/shadow/shadow_4.1.1-1ubuntu1.1/changelog and
